formatted_address: 10 Paya Lebar Road, Paya Lebar Quarter, #B2-34 PLQ Mall, Singapore 409057
name: Eureka Popcorn - PLQ Mall Store

reviews.text:
Beware ladies and gentlemen ! This is junk food is highly addictive ! So for those of you who are poor discipline please don't try it ! And for those who are watching your bodyweight stay away from it !!!!
Once you start there is no going back !!!

staff is helpful. 3 any. free 1. forgot whats the other promo. but sg i feel unless your income is quite high bracket. else ‚Äúcant afford to eat alot‚Äù. anw. went to msia to buy. not sure if taste will be different (?!) becos the ph staff in msia said that diff in taste üëÄ
ok la hope all still taste amazing ok?

msia jb promo is buy 3 free mini can. buy 6 free 2 mini can. 1 big can if member. and above 150rm = free 1 more big can too. member is just sign up on spot no issues. jb din allow tasting on weekend.

i dont thnk the cheese is as nice as garrett but overall everything does taste great!

I saw some previous reviews about poor service so I went there without any expectations. Looks like the staff changed because I was served by this trainee called Linda and she was super friendly. Super patient as I think I sampled at least 10 different flavours. They have all sorts of promotions, I bought 6 packets for clients and because of the promotion permutations I ended up with another 4 packets free lol.
You guys got to try it. It's very good in taste. Tested all flavors and it was delicious.

I was served by Rose and she allowed us to try multiple different favours to find which flavour is the best choice for us. My friend had picked the kimchi and bbq flavour while i picked the sweet ones. They had the promotion of buy 3 get 1 free (90gm). I paid by KrisPay which has 6 miles per dollar back. Unfortunately wanted to pay with Grab Web3 but seems like this store was not capable of.

vicinity: 10 Paya Lebar Road, Paya Lebar Quarter, #B2-34 PLQ Mall, Singapore
